TEXT.TITLE: SRI LANKA GETS USDA APPROVAL FOR WHEAT PRICE
TEXT.BODY: Food Department officials said the U.S. Department of Agriculture approved the Continental Grain Co sale of 52,500 tonnes of soft wheat at 89 U.S. Dlrs a tonne C and F from Pacific Northwest to Colombo. They said the shipment was for April 8 to 20 delivery. REUTER
